document.full_text: contrary to conventional wisdom, patient outcomes had little to do with the time of the operation or the fatigue of the surgeon. rather, they seemed to hinge on the reliability of the surgical team.
document.title: surgeons who burn the midnight oil
lines_and_colors: contrary to conventional wisdom, patient outcomes had little to do with the time of the operation or the fatigue of the surgeon. rather, they seemed to hinge on the reliability of the surgical team.
